definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: disperse, be scattered (oft. taken as secondary √ fr. Niph. of [[פוץ]], yet cf. NH [[נפץ]], Qal (Pt.), Pi., scatter; Syr. nps. pour out, throw down, Targum [[נְפַץ]]; Ar. nafas.a shake (irreg. correspondence of sibilants cf. Nö:l. c.), Eth. nafas’a: dissipari, aufugere Di 713);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הָעָם מֵעָלַי]] ´[[נ]] 1Sa 13:11 the people were scattered from me; 3 fs. [[נׇֽפְחָה כָל־הָאָרֶץ]] Ge 9:19 (J) thence dispersed all (the population of) the earth; 3 pl. [[נׇֽמְחוּ גּוֹיִם]] Is 33:3 nations were scattered; Pt. pass. fpl. cstr. [[נְפֻחוֹת יְהוּדָה]] Is 11:12 the dispersed of Judah he shall collect (‖[[נִדְחֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל]]).
